data.name: Fuecoco
data.flavorText: It lies on warm rocks and uses the heat absorbed by its square-shaped scales to create fire energy.

attacks.name: Super Singe
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

data.name: Arcanine
data.flavorText: An ancient picture scroll shows that people were captivated by its movement as it ran through prairies.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.name: Quaxly
data.flavorText: This Pokémon migrated to Paldea from distant lands long ago. The gel secreted by its feathers repels water and grime.

attacks.name: Water Splash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

data.name: Quaquaval
data.flavorText: A single kick from a Quaquaval can send a truck rolling. This Pokémon uses its powerful legs to perform striking dances from far-off lands.

abilities.name: Energy Carnival
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may attach a Basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.

data.name: Miraidon
data.flavorText: Much remains unknown about this creature. It resembles Cyclizar, but it is far more ruthless and powerful.

attacks.name: Lightning Laser
attacks.text: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Mimikyu ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Void Return
attacks.text: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energy Burst
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each Energy attached to both Active Pokémon.

data.name: Koraidon
data.flavorText: This seems to be the Winged King mentioned in an old expedition journal. It was said to have split the land with its bare fists.

attacks.name: Rampaging Fang
attacks.text: Discard 3 Energy from this Pokémon.

data.name: Pawmot
data.flavorText: Pawmot's fluffy fur acts as a battery. It can store the same amount of electricity as an electric car.

abilities.name: Electrogenesis
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a Basic Lightning Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Electro Paws
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

data.name: Hawlucha
data.flavorText: Its elegant finishing moves—performed by nimbly leaping around using its wings—are polished in the forest where it was born and raised.

abilities.name: Flying Entry
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and put 1 damage counter on each of them.

data.name: Sprigatito
data.flavorText: Its fluffy fur is similar in composition to plants. This Pokémon frequently washes its face to keep it from drying out.

attacks.name: Mini Drain
attacks.text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

data.name: Espathra
data.flavorText: It immobilizes opponents by bathing them in psychic power from its large eyes. Despite its appearance, it has a vicious temperament.

attacks.name: Aurora Gain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

data.name: Revavroom
data.flavorText: It creates a gas out of poison and minerals from rocks. It then detonates the gas in its cylinders— now numbering eight—to generate energy.

abilities.name: Rumbling Engine
abilities.text: You must discard an Energy card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Knock Away
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 90 more damage.

data.name: Spidops
data.flavorText: It clings to branches and ceilings using its threads and moves without a sound. It takes out its prey before the prey even notices it.

attacks.name: String Truss
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.name: Dondozo
data.flavorText: This Pokémon is a glutton, but it's bad at getting food. It teams up with a Tatsugiri to catch prey.

attacks.name: Dangerous Wave
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, this attack does 100 more damage.

data.name: Flaaffy
data.flavorText: As a result of storing too much electricity, it developed patches where even downy wool won't grow.

attacks.name: Extreme Current
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

data.name: Ampharos ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Thunderstrike Tail
attacks.text: You may discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon to have this attack do 100 more damage.

data.name: Lucario ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Aura Sphere
attacks.text: This attack also does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Cyclizar ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Power Run
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Full Throttle
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

data.name: Baxcalibur
data.flavorText: This Pokémon blasts cryogenic air out from its mouth. This air can instantly freeze even liquid-hot lava.

abilities.name: Super Cold
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn, you may attach a Basic Water Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.

data.name: Tinkaton
data.flavorText: This intelligent Pokémon has a very daring disposition. It knocks rocks into the sky with its hammer, aiming for flying Corviknight.

abilities.name: Gather Materials
abilities.text: You must discard a card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Special Hammer
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Special Energy attached, this attack does 90 more damage.

data.name: Murkrow
data.flavorText: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.

attacks.name: Spin Turn
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: United Wings
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each Pokémon in your discard pile that has the United Wings attack.

data.name: Pelipper
data.flavorText: It is a flying transporter that carries small Pokémon in its beak. It bobs on the waves to rest its wings.

abilities.name: Hearsay
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may choose 1: put a Supporter card from your discard pile into your hand; or search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and then shuffle your deck.

data.name: Smoliv
data.flavorText: It protects itself from enemies by emitting oil from the fruit on its head. This oil is bitter and astringent enough to make someone flinch.

attacks.name: Nutrients
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

data.name: Growlithe
data.flavorText: It's very friendly and faithful to people. It will try to repel enemies by barking and biting.

attacks.name: Stoke
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

data.name: Tinkatink
data.flavorText: It swings its handmade hammer around to protect itself, but the hammer is often stolen by Pokémon that eat metal.

attacks.name: Smithereen Smash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.name: Varoom
data.flavorText: It is said that this Pokémon was born when an unknown poison Pokémon entered and inspirited an engine left at a scrap-processing factory.

attacks.name: Poison Gas
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

data.name: Pikachu
data.flavorText: Pikachu seems excited to be going on an adventure, and so do its new pals, from attention-seeking Sprigatito to laid-back Fuecoco and tidy Quaxly.

attacks.name: Adventuring Together
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

data.name: Miraidon ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Tandem Unit
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 Basic Lightning Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Photon Blaster
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

data.name: Koraidon ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Dino Cry
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may attach up to 2 Basic Fighting Energy cards from your discard pile to your Basic Fighting Pokémon in any way you like. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Wild Impact
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

data.name: Annihilape ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Angry Grudge
attacks.text: Put up to 12 damage counters on this Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage for each damage counter you placed in this way.

data.name: Cleffa
data.flavorText: Because of its unusual, starlike silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.

attacks.name: Grasping Draw
attacks.text: Draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand.

data.name: Tinkaton ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Big Hammer
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each card in your hand.

attacks.name: Pulverizing Press
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.name: Chien-Pao ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Shivery Chill
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may search your deck for up to 2 Basic Water Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Hail Blade
attacks.text: You may discard any amount of Water Energy from your Pokémon. This attack does 60 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

data.name: Palafin
data.flavorText: This Pokémon's ancient genes have awakened. It is now so extraordinarily strong that it can easily lift a cruise ship with one fin.

attacks.name: Jet Punch
attacks.text: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Justice Kick
attacks.text: If this Pokémon didn't move from the Bench to the Active Spot this turn, this attack does nothing.

data.name: Mawile
data.flavorText: It chomps with its gaping mouth. Its huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed.

abilities.name: Special Eater
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may discard a Special Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.name: Paldean Wooper
data.flavorText: After losing a territorial struggle, Wooper began living on land. The Pokémon changed over time, developing a poisonous film to protect its body.

attacks.name: Splattering Poison
attacks.text: Both Active Pokémon are now Poisoned.

data.name: Charmander
data.flavorText: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.

attacks.name: Heat Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

data.name: Pawmi
data.flavorText: It has underdeveloped electric sacs on its cheeks. These sacs can produce electricity only if Pawmi rubs them furiously with the pads on its forepaws.

attacks.name: Static Slap
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.name: Houndstone
data.flavorText: Houndstone spends most of its time sleeping in graveyards. Among all the dog Pokémon, this one is most loyal to its master.

attacks.name: Delve
attacks.text: Put up to 2 Item cards from your discard pile into your hand.

data.name: Paradise Resort
rules: The Retreat Cost of each Psyduck in play (both yours and your opponent's) is Colorless less.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

data.name: Togekiss
data.flavorText: Known as a bringer of blessings, it's been depicted on good-luck charms since ancient times.

abilities.name: Precious Gift
abilities.text: Once at the end of your turn (after your attack), you may use this Ability. Draw cards until you have 8 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Power Cyclone
attacks.text: Move an Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.name: Eevee
data.flavorText: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

data.name: Meowscarada ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Bouquet Magic
abilities.text: You must discard a Basic Grass Energy card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scratching Nails
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 120 more damage.

data.name: Skeledirge ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Vitality Song
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Burning Voice
attacks.text: This attack does 10 less damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

data.name: Quaquaval ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Exciting Dance
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Spiral Shot
attacks.text: Put 2 Energy attached to this Pokémon into your hand.

data.name: Bulbasaur
data.flavorText: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.

data.name: Charmander
data.flavorText: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

data.name: Squirtle
data.flavorText: When it feels threatened, it draws its limbs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.name: Zapdos ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Voltaic Float
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has any Lightning Energy attached, it has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Multishot Lightning
attacks.text: This attack also does 90 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Alakazam ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Mind Jack
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dimensional Hand
attacks.text: This attack can be used even if this Pokémon is on the Bench.

data.name: Snorlax
data.flavorText: This POKéMON's stomach is so strong, even eating moldy or rotten food will not affect it.

abilities.name: Voraciousness
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may put up to 2 Leftovers cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Thudding Press
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

data.name: Mewtwo
data.flavorText: A Pokémon created by recombining Mew's genes. It's said to have the most savage heart among Pokémon.

attacks.name: Reflective Barrier
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if it is Knocked Out), put damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon equal to the damage done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psyslash
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

data.name: Mew ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Restart
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Genome Hacking
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack.

data.name: Greninja ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Stealthy Shuriken
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Torrential Slash
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 120 more damage.

data.name: Kangaskhan ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Triple Draw
attacks.text: Draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Incessant Punching
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.

data.name: Pikachu
data.flavorText: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

attacks.name: Scrappy Spark
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

data.name: Charizard ex
rules: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).
Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Infernal Reign
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 3 Basic Fire Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Burning Darkness
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

data.name: Chi-Yu
data.flavorText: It controls flames burning at over 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit. It casually swims through the sea of lava it creates by melting rock and sand.

attacks.name: Flare Bringer
attacks.text: Attach up to 2 Basic Fire Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Megafire of Envy
attacks.text: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

data.name: Iron Bundle
data.flavorText: It resembles a mysterious object mentioned in an old book. There are only two reported sightings of this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Hyper Blower
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.) If you do, discard this Pokémon and all attached cards.

attacks.name: Refrigerated Stream
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, it can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

data.name: Xatu
data.flavorText: This odd Pokémon can see both the past and the future. It eyes the sun's movement all day.

abilities.name: Clairvoyant Sense
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may attach a Basic Psychic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, draw 2 cards.

data.name: Aegislash
data.flavorText: Its potent spectral powers allow it to manipulate others. It once used its powers to force people and Pokémon to build a kingdom to its liking.

abilities.name: Mysterious Shield
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon ex and Pokémon V.

attacks.name: Hard Bashing
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.name: Pineco
data.flavorText: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn't bother it.

data.name: Sinistea
data.flavorText: The soul of someone who died alone possessed some leftover tea. This Pokémon appears in hotels and houses.

attacks.name: Cold Tea
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.name: Cetitan
data.flavorText: This Pokémon wanders around snowy, icy areas. It protects its body with powerful muscles and a thick layer of fat under its skin.

attacks.name: Avalanche
attacks.text: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Rolling Slider
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.

data.name: Arctibax
data.flavorText: Arctibax freezes the air around it, protecting its face with an ice mask and turning its dorsal fin into a blade of ice.

data.name: Scream Tail
data.flavorText: There has been only one reported sighting of this Pokémon. It resembles a mysterious creature depicted in an old expedition journal.

attacks.name: Roaring Scream
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each damage counter on this Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Iron Bundle
data.flavorText: It resembles a mysterious object mentioned in an old book. There are only two reported sightings of this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Hyper Blower
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.) If you do, discard this Pokémon and all attached cards.

attacks.name: Refrigerated Stream
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, it can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

data.name: Roaring Moon ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Frenzied Gouging
attacks.text: Knock Out your opponent's Active Pokémon. If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Knocked Out in this way, this Pokémon does 200 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Calamity Storm
attacks.text: You may discard a Stadium in play. If you do, this attack does 120 more damage.

data.name: Iron Valiant ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Tachyon Bits
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when this Pokémon moves from your Bench to the Active Spot, you may put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Laser Blade
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Graveyard Gamboling
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage for each Psychic Pokémon in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Ambush
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

abilities.name: Safeguard
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon ex and Pokémon V.

attacks.name: Ghost Eye
attacks.text: Put 7 damage counters on your opponent's Active Pokémon.
